price: ខ្យល់ព្យុះបានគួចយកមនុស្សលោក ពួកគេហាក់បីដូចជា គល់ល្មើដែលរលើងចេញពីដី។
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: tanziʿu al-nāsa ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin munqaʿirin
